short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy this amazing football championship, choose the team of your choice and get to work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pick your favorite player and go up against other pro's in this 1-on-1 game of soccer! Try to score more goals than your opponent in order to advance to the next level. Hit the power-ups with the ball to activate them!
